All Classes

Class Description
AddAppointmentController
This class handles the Add Appointment form page.
AddCustomerController
This class handles the Add Customer Page.
Appointment
This class manages the Appointment object.
BusinessHours
This class manages the business hours set in Eastern Time.
Contact
This class manages the Contact object.
Countries
This class manages the Countries objects.
Customer
This class manages the Customer Object.
CustomerTotal
This class controls how many customers belong to a certain group.
DateFilter
This class controls the options available for filtering out by date.
ErrorMessage
This class manages the methods used for handling errors that occur in the program.
FirstLevelDivisions
This class controls the FirstLevelDivisions.
Form
This class controls the form and any form changes throughout the program.
JDBC
This class controls the connection between the client to the database.
Lang
This class holds the method for translating words to different languages.
LoginController
This class controls the Login page.
Main
This class is the main file.
MainMenuViewAllController
This class controls the Main Menu View All page.
MainMenuViewByMonthController
This class controls the Main Menu View By Month page.
MainMenuViewByWeekController
This class controls the Main Menu View By Week page.
MainMenuViewCustomersController
This class controls the Main Menu View By Customer page.
ModifyAppointmentController
This class controls the modify appointment page.
ModifyCustomerController
When the Modify Customer page is initialized this method will run.
MonthAndType
This class controls the MonthAndType object.
MyInterface
This interface holds the functionality for the LAMBDA expressions.
OverlappingAppointments
This class is used to determine if appointments being added or modify interfere with existing appointments in the database.
Query
This class controls the queries made to the database.
ReportsContactScheduleController
This class controls the Reports Contact Schedule Page.
ReportsContactViewByMonthAndTypeController
This class controls the Reports Contact View By Month And Type Page.
ReportsViewByCountryController
This class controls the Reports Contact View By Country Page.
TimeConversion
This class controls the time conversions in the program.
UpcomingAppointmentAlert
This class controls a dialog box letting the user know if any appointment is upcoming.
